Activity: Wake up, blast some upbeat music (maybe some Portugal. The Man?), and get hyped for the week! Check emails and company announcements - gotta stay in the loop.

Quick brainstorm session. Grab my favorite sketchbook and start jotting down initial thoughts about the game world. Think vibrant, maybe a little surreal. What kind of feeling do we want players to have? Focus: Initial sketches and mood boards.

Dive deeper into mood board creation. Gather inspiring images - architecture, nature, other games - anything that sparks ideas for the game's visual identity. Consider different themes: Sci-fi, fantasy, post-apocalyptic? Explore art styles like cel-shaded, realistic, or stylized. Save all findings into a specific folder.

Refine initial sketches. Choose the most promising concepts and develop them further. Focus on the overall atmosphere and key locations within the game world. Annotate the sketches with notes about gameplay possibilities and story elements. Save different versions.
Lunch time! Grab some food and chill a little bit.
Continue to refine initial sketches and make some high-fidelity modifications.
Email @lpro-1, @cdev-1 to discuss the mood board and initial sketches and get feedback. Topic: Mood board and initial sketches feedback
More modification according to the feedback.
Head home! Time to relax and recharge for tomorrow.
